title: S1 Ep77: On The Trail Of The Paranormal World w/ John Kachuba - Hr.1
itunes:title: On The Trail Of The Paranormal World w/ John Kachuba - Hr.1
description:
Author/Researcher/Paranormal Investigator John Kachuba talks about his new book, "Ghosthunters: On the Trail of Mediums, Dowsers, Spirit Seekers, and Other Investigators of America's Paranormal World".

We also talk to John about his favorite haunts, and favorite spooky stories!Â
